title: Local scope
post:
{{Sidebar("Glossary")}}

Local scope is a characteristic of {{glossary("variable","variables")}} that makes them local (i.e., the variable name is only bound to its {{glossary("value")}} within a scope which is not the {{glossary("global scope")}}).
